Objective

I aim to bridge the gap between business needs and modern technical capabilities.

Qualifications

I have a degree in software engineering with a certificate in Data Science from Harvard. I have extensive experience in financial and technical management with a unique set of experiences which position me well to understand a broad scope of business functions and markets:

  • Controller of multi-location large engineered equipment manufacturer
  • Led numerous US and international new acquisition integrations
  • CIO of US Siemens Mobile Phone business
  • Led various small and large digital transformation efforts
  • Worked in Germany for 5 years (fluent in German)
